body_html:
ok. finally, made it work. Here is what I did.

  1. updated to Android Studio to the latest (version 3.2)
  2. git to master
    commit cc5555d (HEAD, origin/master, origin/HEAD, master)
  3. change this line in build.gradle:
    classpath 'com.android.tools.build:gradle:3.1.4' //3.0.1'
  4. import to Android Studio (just installed whatever it recommended)
body_text:
ok. finally, made it work. Here is what I did.

updated to Android Studio to the latest (version 3.2)
git to master
commit cc5555d (HEAD, origin/master, origin/HEAD, master)
change this line in build.gradle:
classpath 'com.android.tools.build:gradle:3.1.4' //3.0.1'
import to Android Studio (just installed whatever it recommended)
body:
ok. finally, made it work. Here is what I did.
1) updated to Android Studio to the latest (version 3.2)
2) git to master
commit cc5555d3d3daa64f462cc7f8d31fe915073429f4 (HEAD, origin/master, origin/HEAD, master)
2) change this line in build.gradle:
        classpath 'com.android.tools.build:gradle:3.1.4' //3.0.1'
3) import to Android Studio (just installed whatever it recommended)
